description.p: LBreakoutHD is a clone of popular games such as Arkanoid or Breakout
The Classic theme uses the proper warp icon geometry for full compatibility with retro themes.
Instead of just a list index the theme name is saved in the config file to prevent unwanted switches on installing new themes.
And the pseudo-set Random20 has been improved to discard "hard" levels (too many difficult bricks, too close to paddle, ...) to make it more casual and fun.
I've added a menu option to disable/enable gamepad support and a custom cursor.
Also levelsets Picky by Michael Uplawski and JustGoForIt were updated.
Just a very minor update that installs the icon according to specification (again).
Hiscores are now saved for the windows port.
Somehow destructing the client game object does not work properly in windows but with this workaround at least the hiscores get saved.
Also I removed the intl directory from the source since the latest gettext version only supports external libintl (either in libc or as library).
Some configuration and installation issues were fixed, e.g., icons get properly installed now.
Also the correct resolution will be selected on multi-display setups with different ratios.
A rare segmentation fault has been fixed and the mini game "Outbreak" has been tweaked and is a bit easier now.
Fixed texture problem with old hardware.
